attributes.action: driving instructors to do driving exams to help people pass their driving test.
attributes.additional_details: This will help thousands of people pass their test, and will help remove the 6 month + waiting list.
attributes.background: 2020- 2021 has been a strange time for everyone, and driving exams are being affected, the back log is in effect of 6 months +, to help reduce this I think driving instructor should be granted a temporary pass to be able to pass off there students that are test ready.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576153
